item.title: Fishing skill problems
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

ok i finally got it, this compiles 100% so be sure to add it in the right spot

case 42: //manta spot if(playerLevel[10] >= 90 && playerHasItemAmount(311, 1)==true); { if(actionTimer == 0) { actionTimer = 20; startAnimation(618); addItem(389, 1); addSkillXP((75*playerLevel[10]), 10); sendMessage("You have caught a manta ray"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else if(playerLevel[10] <= 89) { sendMessage("You need a fishing level of 90 to catch manta's"); } else if(playerHasItemAmount(311, 1)==false); { sendMessage("Try bringing a harpoon genius..."); }
gooodnight, pm me and ill re-write this tommorow and add a x27 loop for you

else if (NPCID == 233) { if(playerLevel[10] >= 90) { if(actionTimer == 0) { actionTimer = 20; startAnimation(618); addItem(389, 1); addSkillXP((75*playerLevel[10]), 10); sendMessage("You have caught a manta ray"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else if(playerLevel[10] <= 89) { sendMessage("You need a fishing level of 90 to catch manta's");[br][size=1]Posted on: October 30, 2007, 06:51:42 PM[/size][hr]soneone ?
